@usedefaults

{{timestamp}}

{{aysactors: reponame:$$reponame}}

{{breadcrumb:
    - Repository : /ays81/repos
    - Repo ${reponame}: /ays81/Repo?repopath=$$ayspath&repo=${reponame}
    - Actors: /ays81/actors?reponame=$$reponame
}}

{{cssstyle
    .table {
        position: relative;
        left: 7%;
    }
}}

h3. Actors $$reponame:

*Repo*: [${reponame}|/ays81/repo?repopath=$$repo&repo=${reponame}]

{{html:
      <script  src='/jslib/codemirror/autorefresh.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
}}


h4. Actors:
{% for actor in actors -%}
    {{html:
        <div>
           <button type="button" class="btn btn-info" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#actor${actor.name}">+</button> <b> actor ${actor.name}</b>
          <div id="actor${actor.name}" class="collapse">
     }}
     {% for key, value in actor.items() -%}
      {% if value and key != 'name' %}
        h5. ${key} :
          {{code:
${value} }}
          {% endif %}
     {% endfor %}
    {{html:
        </div>
        </div>
        <br>
    }}
{% endfor -%}
